title: Sorry for loving you
description: Karma Serves What You Deserve…What happens after death may be one of the biggest mysteries to man… but a plethora of scriptures exist gives us vivid details of the mythological significance of death and the afterlife.A step into the various dimensions of life, death and the beyond is done by our character that goes through unforeseeable dilemmas of its own demise…We take you on an inside out journey through various realms of reality, the divine and also punishment……When you go onto the path that leads away the breath of life. Then you will be led by the will of the Gods. May your eye go to sun, your life breathes to the wind; go to the sky or the earth as is your nature...I can bet going through this book will not only make you more wiser but also helps you to understand the eternals cosmic laws to make your sailing in both the world Much Smoother.
author: Abhishek Agrawal
